content: **knitted drops hat and neck warmer with spiral pattern in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ee-501 yarn group e or c + c ----------------------------------------------------------- **neck warmer** size s/m - l/xl circumference approx 57-65 cm / 22½ -25½ height approx 18-24 cm / 7 -9½ materials drops snow from garnstudio 100 g for all sizes in color no 47 light beige drops double pointed needles size 8 mm / us 11 - or size needed to get 11 sts x 15 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm ** pattern for the whirlwind hat can be found here 1 ** 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/157-38-whirlwind-hat
